subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Coaches and their soaring salaries are the hot topic at the Final Four, the market being driven ever higher by Kentucky’s primal lust for a return to the glory days of Adolph Rupp.
snippet: Coaches and their soaring salaries are the hot topic at the Final Four, the market being driven ever higher by Kentucky’s primal lust for a return to the glory days of Adolph Rupp.
